Articles.Content:
Well I am not new to KSP but kethane is a new thing for me does anyone have a how to or some crafts using kethane. My current and only mods are Kethane obviously , b9 areospace, kw rocketry, and mecjeb 2.0.9.

Side note I think mecjeb is a lil screwed up everything seems to want to just spin when its done with its task at hand or when trying to align itself.

Thanks in advance. War

Well, I am not new to KSP but kethane is a new thing for me. Does anyone have a how to or some crafts using kethane? My current and only mods are Kethane (obviously) , b9 aerospace, kw rocketry, and mechjeb 2.0.9.

Side note: I think mechjeb is a lil' screwed up. Everything seems to want to just spin when its done with it's task at hand or when trying to align itself.

Thanks in advance. War

I hate to be THAT guy.

This would also be of help to me as well! I am also new to kethane and have been having trouble designing ships that actually work for it This could just be the start of the Modcraft kethane exchange thread I was just aboutto post the same thing when I saw this one Good thinkin WarMachin32

Yeah mechjeb doesnt seem to like the new SAS system I think.
Sorry I'm a mechanic not an English professor.

Nevermind this post lolol saw what other one was referring to...

Edited August 12, 2013 by Rassa Farlander
Ive got problems :)

Sorry I'm a mechanic not an English professor.

I didn't mean to offend you, sorry if I did.

As for the Kethane ships, consider a permanent miner with power, extractors, converters, and storage. keep it in one stack if possible to keep fuel routing simple.

...This could just be the start of the Modcraft kethane exchange thread

There's already a thread for that:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/32991-Show-off-your-Kethane-Mining-Designs%21%21?highlight=kethane+creations

Edited August 12, 2013 by astropapi1
No dude we are cool I wasn't being cross or anything lol just I suck with those things. And that was exactly the info I was looking for.
